main event: An unidentified object was observed in Dayton, Ohio on September 11, 1967, described as a white light that transformed into a circular object with pulsating lights, lasting for approximately 15-20 minutes.
interesting points: The object gradually changed color from white to other hues like green, blue, and red., It was reported that the object emitted no sound., Two witnesses were reported to have seen the object, indicating possible confirmation of the sighting., The object was observed at a distance estimated between 10-20 miles from the witness., Estimates of the object's speed ranged from 10-20 miles.
sighted object: a circular object with pulsating lights
witness description: The witnesses provided observations detailing the object's color, shape, and movement, but their specific identities are not disclosed.
